query.prompt:
This text is written in Serbian (Latin). Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Gender, Case, Number, Person, Tense, Mood and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 Na polovini puta našeg života 9 reći ću o drugim stvarima koje sam tamo ugledao. 28 Pošto sam malo odmorio umorno telo, 67 Odgovori mi: „Nisam čovek, čovek sam nekada bio,
query.result: |Word|Lemma|Part of Speech|Gender|Case|Number|Person|Tense|Mood|Note| |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| |Na|na|preposition|||||||| |polovini|polovina|noun|f.|locative|sg.||||| |puta|put|noun|m.|genitive|sg.||||| |našeg|naš|adjective|m.|genitive|sg.||||possessive| |života|život|noun|m.|genitive|sg.||||| |reći|reći|verb||||1|future|indicative|| |ću|ću|auxiliary verb||||1|future|indicative|| |o|o|preposition|||||||| |drugim|drugi|adjective|m.|instrumental|pl.||||| |stvarima|stvar|noun|f.|instrumental|pl.||||| |koje|koji|pronoun||accusative|pl.||||relative| |sam|sam|pronoun||nominative|sg.|1|||emphatic| |tamo|tamo|adverb|||||||| |ugledao|ugledati|verb|m.|past participle|sg.||past|indicative|| |Pošto|pošto|conjunction|||||||causal| |sam|sam|pronoun||nominative|sg.|1|||emphatic| |malo|malo|adverb|||||||| |odmorio|odmoriti|verb|m.|past participle|sg.||past|indicative|| |umorno|umoran|adjective|m.|accusative|sg.||||| |telo|telo|noun|n.|accusative|sg.||||| |Odgovori|odgovoriti|verb|m.|imperative|sg.|2||imperative|| |mi|mi|pronoun||dative|sg.|1|||| |Nisam|biti|verb||present|indicative|1|negative||contraction of "ni jesam"| |čovek|čovek|noun|m.|nominative|sg.||||| |čovek|čovek|noun|m.|nominative|sg.||||| |sam|sam|pronoun||nominative|sg.|1|||emphatic| |nekada|nekada|adverb|||||||| |bio|biti|verb|m.|past participle|sg.||past|indicative||
